# The `OptClass` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Convienence wrapper around <code><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/tablegen/emitter/opt">Opt</a></code> that registers <code>EmitterClass::run</code> as the callback. <a href="#details">More...</a>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/tablegen/emitter/opt">Opt</a></>}>
Creating an <code><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/tablegen/emitter/opt">Opt</a></code> object registers the command line option <code>Name</code> with <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/tablegen">TableGen</a> backend and associates the callback <code>CB</code> with that option. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/tablegen/emitter/opt/#details">More...</a>
